siteMetadata.name: Liza Katz
siteMetadata.title: Liza Katz | Full-Stack Developer & GenAI Consultant | RAG, LLMs, AI Agents
siteMetadata.description: Seasoned Full-Stack Developer & GenAI Consultant | Ex-Elastic | RAG, Agents, LLMs, Search Optimization
siteMetadata.about:
Seasoned software engineer and team lead specializing in GenAI, search, and scalable systems. I build RAG applications, AI agents, and hybrid search solutions using Python, TypeScript, Next.js, and modern frameworks.

As a consultant, I've delivered end-to-end GenAI projects for clients across industries. My background spans ad-tech, finance, and big data with deep expertise in Elasticsearch, OpenSearch, and LLM-powered applications.

Recent wins: Webby Award for "Human or Not" and Google AI Hackathon winner for "Tube Uni."

Available for GenAI consulting, partnerships, public speaking, and private workshops.

projects.name: Human or Not (AI21)
projects.description: **Webby Award Winner!** A Social Turing Game. Chat with someone for two minutes, and try to figure out if it was a fellow human or an AI bot. Think you can tell the difference?

projects.name: Scout AI Agent (Max Security)
projects.description: Built an AI assistant providing comprehensive threat intelligence and geo-spatial analysis. Integrates multiple geopolitical datasets for proactive threat mitigation. AWS, OpenSearch, Claude.

projects.name: Data Analytics Pipelines and RAG Architecture (Cover)
projects.description: Designed data analytics pipelines and RAG architecture for an insurance AI agent. OpenSearch, OpenAI, n8n.

projects.name: Hybrid Search for customer support (ScreenSteps)
projects.description: Developed hybrid search combining keyword and semantic search for knowledge base platform. Improved customer article discovery and support efficiency. Elasticsearch, AWS Bedrock.

projects.name: Tube Uni
projects.description: **Google AI Hackathon Winner!** An AI-powered application that generates custom podcasts on any topic, using Gemini 1.5 Pro.

projects.name: MoMa AI Assistant (Nayax)
projects.description: Built ReAct AI assistant for vending machine operators, improving maintenance and customer service. Custom OpenAI deployment on Azure with prompt engineering, automation, evaluation and monitoring.

projects.name: Goods.io - Elasticsearch integration and analytics
projects.description: Developed analytics strategy and Elasticsearch integration for order fulfillment platform. Built customer dashboards for inventory management and order analytics.

projects.name: Outburn LTD Automation and OpenSource infrastructure
projects.description: Prepared FHIR-based healthcare API codebase for open source contributions. Built automation pipeline with GitHub Actions, TypeScript implementation, and contribution documentation.

projects.name: ncnn WebAssembly YOLOV5
projects.description: Open source contribution enabling YOLOV5 inference directly in browsers via WebAssembly.

experience.name: Big Data Boutique
experience.description:
Gen AI Team Lead, August 2024 - Present
Leading a team of 3 engineers (Data Science, Full Stack and DevOps). Developed several production RAG applications on top of OpenSearch\ElasticSearch, using aws cloud tools such as Bedrock, SageMaker, EC2, AWS Lambda, ECS, S3 with all leading LLMs (Gemini, Claude, GPT-x)

experience.name: Independent Consultant & Developer
experience.description:
Consultant & Full-Stack Developer, January 2023 - Present
Worked with several customers including AI21, mygoods.io, Outburn LTD and more. I focus on projects that focus on developing LLM-powered user experiences, powered by big data and search capabilities

experience.name: Elastic
experience.description:
Principal Full-Stack Developer, Performance Area Lead, January 2019 - December 2022
Worked on the Kibana architecture & services team, focused on delivering common services and React components to platform and solution teams. My contributions to Kibana, Kibana Load Testing, Kibana Capacity Test and more were made in private repositories. I was also the Performance Area Lead for Kibana, responsible for the performance of the Kibana platform.

experience.name: ironSource (Unity)
experience.description:
Full-Stack Developer, Team Lead, May 2013 - April 2018
Developed the MobileCore SDK, a cross-platform SDK for mobile developers to monetize their apps. I was responsible for the SDK's architecture, design, and implementation. I then led a team of developers and QA engineers, to develop a mobile video advertising solution, supporting cutting edge ad formats, advertising standards and targeting options. A lot of my work was focused on ad serving business logic, which led to optimizations, cutting upto 70% of data and traffic costs.

experience.name: Platonix Joint Ventures
experience.description:
Full-Stack Developer, 2008 - 2013
Worked as a fulltime freelance developer for a private equity firm. I was involved in multiple projects of different scales and complexities, using a variety of programming languages and environments, per customer requirements. Worked directly with customers from multiple industries, including finance, healthcare, and entertainment.

experience.name: AISeek
experience.description:
Embedded C \ C++ Developer, 2006 - 2008
AISeek developed an hardware that could accelerate the execution of A* algorithms on hardware, hence allowing to improve NPC AI in games. I was involved in the development of the hardware's firmware, and the software that interfaced with it. I also developed a custom C++ library for the hardware's API.

skills.name: Databases
skills.description: Elasticsearch, OpenSearch, Redis, PostreSQL, BigQuery, RedShift

skills.name: Other
skills.description: GCP, Vertex AI, AWS, Bedrock, Docker, Roboflow, Vercel, Github Actions

frontmatter.description: Learn to build and deploy production-ready Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems with hands-on guidance from preprocessing to evaluation.
